document.masterDocTitle: The types of Anthomyiidae (Diptera) in the Shanghai Entomological Museum, Chinese Academy of Science, China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The types of Anthomyiidae (Diptera) in the Shanghai Entomological Museum, Chinese Academy of Science, China

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype male with labels: (1) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “ Heilongjiang / Yichun /
Wuying
/ Chinese Academy of Sciences ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “19
78. V .11
/ collector
Sanyang Fang
”; (3) printed with handwritten inscriptions on red label: “ TYPE /
Lasiomma luteoforceps
/ Fan et Fang / 1978 ”; (4) printed with handwritten inscriptions on red label: “ TYPE /
Strobilomyia
/
luteoforceps
/ (Fan et Fang) ”.

subSubSection.paragraph: Preservation: pinned; specimen intact.

Paratype male with labels: (1) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “
Yichun
/
Wuying
/ Chinese Academy of Sciences ”; (2) handwritten on white label: “
1978.VI.16
/ collector Sanyang Fang ”; (3) handwritten on white label: “ Lasiomma luteoforceps / with interfrontal setae”; (4) printed with handwritten inscriptions on red label: “ PARATYPE /
Strobilomyia
/
luteoforceps
/ (Fan et Fang) ”
.
Preservation: pinned; all legs mounted on paper triangle.
